chunk:
Anne's Apothecary Rescue Facial oil

Brand: Anne's Apothecary

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Carthamus Tinctoruius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Argania (Argan Oil) Spinosa, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia Oil), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) (German Blue Chamomile) Flower Oil, Jasminum Officinale Oil
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
